dict.acceptation: 如果，倘若；即使；〈口〉是否；假设；

sent.orig: BMD of the lumbar vertebrae in OVX-IF, OVX-EXE and OVX-IF-EXE was significantly higher than in OVX(P<0.01).
Interestingly, although both forskolin and IBMX increased basal If, their effects on CCh-inhibited If were different.
sent.trans: 但有趣的是，尽管Forskolin和IBMX可增加基础If,它们对CCh抑制的If的作用却大不相同。

sent.orig: If there is an IF inside a stored procedure, you are doing something wrong.
sent.trans: 果存储过程中有IF,尔可能犯了错误。

sent.orig: IF_FUNCS-This is an array of the names of permitted PHP functions in IF statements.
sent.trans: 这是一个可允许包含在if语句中的php函数名数组。

sent.orig: If there is an IF inside a stored procedure, are doing something wrong.
sent.trans: 如果存储过程中有IF,你可能犯了错误。
